message: Let's start fair, Bob. 900k for me, 100k for you. This is a good first step towards a mutually beneficial outcome.
You're being too greedy, Alice. I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40 this time. We both get a decent share, and we can avoid further losses due to inflation.
I'm not going for 60/40, Alice. You're still getting a bigger share than me. I'll give you 45% this time, but I'm not budging further.
